this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - orange - yarn needle - stitch marker - scissors final size - the diameter is 10 cm technical notes *the ears are worked in spirals so use a stitch marker to indicate the start of a round *each round of the coaster is joined with a slip_stitch *the slip_stitch is worked into the first stitch of the round not one of the chains *finish all pieces before attaching them together *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains or slip stitches ears orange make 2 round 1 make a magic_ring into the magic_ring make 4 single_crochet 4 sts round 2 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around 6 sts round 3 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around 9 sts round 4 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts repeat around 12 sts round 5 make 1 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts *fasten_off and leave 20 cm of yarn to sew the ears to the head face/coaster orange round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts round 4 chain 2 make 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts followed by 2 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts round 5 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first st followed by 2 single_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts repeat around join with a slip_stitch 50 sts *fasten_off link to video https //youtu be/dlmt8zc3xq0 if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
